An AI-powered Chrome Extension designed to effortlessly find and engage ideal leads on LinkedIn.

ZoomContact harnesses advanced AI capabilities to offer a multitude of benefits for recruiters and sales professionals:
1. Instant Access to Contact Information: Retrieve phone numbers and email addresses with just one click.
2. Enhanced LinkedIn Search Results: Boost the effectiveness of your LinkedIn searches to uncover valuable leads.
3. AI-Powered Profile Summaries: Quickly summarize profiles to assess candidate strengths and experiences.
4. Efficient Lead Discovery: Use AI-generated Boolean search strings to find similar leads rapidly.
5. Streamlined Email Creation: Expedite your communication with AI-generated prompts tailored to your specific requirements.
6. Connection Management: Effectively manage your LinkedIn connections to maintain and build professional relationships.

üéÅ Start for FREE: Install ZoomContact on your browser and enjoy 50 contact credits and 500 GenAI credits each month.
